name: ai-design-components
description: Comprehensive full-stack development skills for AI-assisted development covering UI/UX, backend, DevOps, infrastructure, security, and AI/ML

plugins.name: ui-foundation-skills
plugins.description: Foundational design system including tokens and theming for consistent styling across all components

plugins.name: ui-data-skills
plugins.description: Data visualization, tables, and dashboard components for displaying and analyzing data

plugins.name: ui-input-skills
plugins.description: Form systems, search, and filter components for user input and data collection

plugins.name: ui-interaction-skills
plugins.description: Interactive components including AI chat interfaces, drag-drop functionality, and feedback systems

plugins.name: ui-structure-skills
plugins.description: Navigation, layout, and timeline components for app structure and organization

plugins.name: ui-content-skills
plugins.description: Media management and user onboarding components for content-rich experiences

plugins.name: ui-assembly-skills
plugins.description: Capstone skill for assembling component outputs into unified, production-ready systems with token validation and framework scaffolding

plugins.name: backend-data-skills
plugins.description: Database and data storage: relational, vector, time-series, document, graph, plus data ingestion

plugins.name: backend-api-skills
plugins.description: API development, messaging, and real-time communication

plugins.name: backend-platform-skills
plugins.description: Observability, security, and deployment infrastructure

plugins.name: backend-ai-skills
plugins.description: AI/ML data engineering and model serving

plugins.name: devops-skills
plugins.description: CI/CD pipelines, GitOps workflows, testing strategies, platform engineering, and containerization

plugins.name: infrastructure-skills
plugins.description: Kubernetes operations, infrastructure as code, networking, service mesh, and distributed systems

plugins.name: security-skills
plugins.description: Security architecture, compliance frameworks, vulnerability management, TLS, firewalls, and SIEM

plugins.name: developer-productivity-skills
plugins.description: API design, CLI development, SDK creation, documentation generation, debugging, and Git workflows

plugins.name: data-engineering-skills
plugins.description: Data architecture, streaming pipelines, transformations, SQL optimization, and performance engineering

plugins.name: ai-ml-skills
plugins.description: MLOps patterns, prompt engineering, LLM evaluation, and embedding optimization

plugins.name: cloud-provider-skills
plugins.description: Cloud-specific patterns and best practices for AWS, GCP, and Azure

plugins.name: finops-skills
plugins.description: Cloud cost optimization and resource tagging strategies

plugins.name: agentic-skills
plugins.description: Autonomous capabilities for orchestration, browser interaction, and complex workflow management
